Kimimaro [[Body Flicker Technique|teleports]] above the opponent, extending his bones and then spins downwards like a giant drill to rip through the opponent's body.

== Trivia ==
*Fitting in with the Kaguya clan's flower motifs, the Japanese word "fūsha/kazaguruma" also refers to specifically the clematis patens (different from the [[Dance of the Clematis|Chinese clematis]]).
